lines.text: Why isn't anybody doing anything to get me out of here?

[to Lottie]
Filthy liar! Here we'll wash your mouth out with soap, here!
Don't make me wait for those onions Hermann

[after a huge fish like demon is attacking the male model]
MY GOD! What's going on here?
Where the fuck have you been? I've been looking all over for you.
Joanna we have to get out of here.
Well what are we waiting for, huh?
